languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько часов поисков старшего офицера доставляют на борт в почти бессознательном состоянии. Память о событиях прошедшего дня полностью покинула изможденный разум, однако врачеватели отметили, что некоторые функции тела... удивительным образом подверглись пускай и едва заметным, но необъяснимым метаморфозам. Навсегда или нет — покажет лишь время.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Спустя несколько часов поисков старшего офицера доставляют на борт в почти бессознательном состоянии. Память о событиях прошедшего дня полностью покинула изможденный разум, однако врачеватели отметили, что некоторые функции тела... удивительным образом подверглись пускай и едва заметным, но необъяснимым метаморфозам. Навсегда или нет — покажет лишь время.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько часов поисков старшего офицера доставляют на борт в почти бессознательном состоянии. Навсегда или нет — покажет лишь время.{/n}

Their exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of their bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

{n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

languages.text: {n}经过几个小时的搜救之后，这位高阶军官被带回了船上。他几乎已经不省人事，疲惫不堪的大脑也不记得当天到底发生了什么事情。不过，船上的医疗师注意到，他的一部分身体机能发生了几乎难以察觉而又无法解释的变化。至于这种变化是不是永久性的，恐怕只能等待后续观察了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}经过几个小时的搜救之后，这位高阶军官被带回了船上。他几乎已经不省人事，疲惫不堪的大脑也不记得当天到底发生了什么事情。不过，船上的医疗师注意到，他的一部分身体机能发生了几乎难以察觉而又无法解释的变化。至于这种变化是不是永久性的，恐怕只能等待后续观察了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de varias horas de búsqueda, traen al oficial a la nave. Su mente, agotada, no guarda recuerdo alguno de los sucesos del día, pero los médicos indican que algunas de sus funciones corporales han atravesado una transformación imperceptible e inexplicable. Solo el tiempo dirá si el cambio es algo permanente o no.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de varias horas de búsqueda, traen al oficial a la nave. Su mente, agotada, no guarda recuerdo alguno de los sucesos del día, pero los médicos indican que algunas de sus funciones corporales han atravesado una transformación imperceptible e inexplicable. Solo el tiempo dirá si el cambio es algo permanente o no.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach mehrstündiger Suche wird der leitende Offizier an Bord gebracht, kaum bei Bewusstsein. Sein erschöpfter Geist kann sich nicht mehr an die Ereignisse des Tages erinnern, aber die Heiler haben festgestellt, dass einige seiner Körperfunktionen eine fast unmerkliche, aber unerklärliche Veränderung erfahren haben. Ob diese Veränderung dauerhaft ist oder nicht, wird nur die Zeit zeigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après plusieurs heures de recherches, l'officier supérieur est ramené à bord, à peine conscient. Épuisé mentalement, il est incapable de se rappeler les événements de la journée, mais les soigneurs rapportent que certaines de ses fonctions corporelles ont inexplicablement subi des transformations presque imperceptibles. Seul le temps dira si ces changements sont de nature permanente ou non.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après plusieurs heures de recherches, l'officier supérieur est ramené à bord, à peine conscient. Épuisé mentalement, il est incapable de se rappeler les événements de la journée, mais les soigneurs rapportent que certaines de ses fonctions corporelles ont inexplicablement subi des transformations presque imperceptibles. Seul le temps dira si ces changements sont de nature permanente ou non.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数時間ほど捜索して、上級士官はほとんど意識のない状態で船に運ばれて来た。精神的に参って、その日の出来事をまったく覚えていないものの、回復班は彼の身体機能の一部に、どういうわけかほとんど分からず説明も難しい、変化が起こっていると気づく。これがずっと続くものかそうでないかは、時間が経たないと分からない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数時間ほど捜索して、上級士官はほとんど意識のない状態で船に運ばれて来た。精神的に参って、その日の出来事をまったく覚えていないものの、回復班は彼の身体機能の一部に、どういうわけかほとんど分からず説明も難しい、変化が起こっていると気づく。これがずっと続くものかそうでないかは、時間が経たないと分からない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saatlik aramanın ardından, bilinci neredeyse kapalı durumdaki kıdemli subay gemiye getiriliyor. Bitkin zihni olan biteni hatırlayamasa da şifacılar, bedensel fonksiyonlarının fark edilmesi neredeyse imkânsız olmasına rağmen gerçekleştiği şüphe götürmeyen bazı değişimler geçirdiğini belirtiyor. Bu değişimin kalıcı olup olmadığını zaman gösterecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After several hours of searching, the senior officer is brought aboard, barely conscious. His exhausted mind has no recollection of the day's events, but the healers have noted that some of his bodily functions somehow underwent an almost imperceptible yet inexplicable transformation. Whether this change is permanent or not, only time will tell.{/n}
